bibl.title: A New Fragment of the Theramenes Papyrus (P. Mich. 5796b).
bibl.note: P. Mich. Inv. 5796b makes a perfect join to the left-hand side of the unplaced fragment of P. Mich. Inv. 5982 [edd.: Herbert C. YOUTIE und Reinhold MERKELBACH, Ein Michigan-Papyrus Ã¼ber Theramenes, ZPE 2 (1968) pp. 161-169 et pl. III]. Karanis, II AD. - A. The New Papyrus Fragment. - B. The Authorship of the Theramenes Papyrus. [Ephorus?] - Pp. 19-20: Appendix. Comparison between Literary Texts found at Karanis and Literary Texts Written in School Hands Identified by R. Cribiore.
LOFTUS Ariel, A New Fragment of the Theramenes Papyrus (P. Mich. 5796b).
